attributes.action: Make sure that all horse/ponies and donkey meat traders gets registered and requires an license
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the alleged cruelty case we have all had an eye opener. These horses were going to be slaughtered for cat food and the reality is that anyone can  buy horses/ponies and donkeys and make a living out of it with no one checking the welfare of the animals ! All meat traders need to be registered and licensed with DEFRA. And facilities needs to be inspected on a regular basis

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
